content: this openwork crochet shawl is ideal for summer or when you need a light layer of warmth ultra comfortable in our caron cotton ripple cakes a light ripple texture is incorporated with granny crochet stitches and framed with picot edging featuring chain double_crochet and treble_crochet stitches you ll work from the center and increase stitches to form a triangular shaped shawl no sizing makes this option a stylish no-fuss gift idea
